remark.p: former member, U.S. House of Representatives (D-New York) and head of Americans for Democratic Action; consultant to the Department of State; head of the U.S. delegation to the 32nd United Nations Human Rights Commission meeting, from February until March 1977; alternate U.S. Representative to the United Nations for Special Political Affairs from 1977 until 1978
